songs.title: Pumpin’ Up the Party
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Hey, get up, get loud
Start pumping up the party now
Hey, get up, get loud
Start pumping up the party now

[Verse 1]
It's the same old, same grind
But we don't care we're wasting time
Not so bored that we can't find no better way
My friends, my kind
No one's getting left behind
If they did, it'd be a crime, that's why we say

[Pre-Chorus 1]
Let the music start a revolution (revolution)
No time to play it safe

[Chorus]
Hey, get up, get loud
Start pumping up the party now
Hey, get up, get loud
Start pumping up the party now

[Verse 2]
They can't, we can
Parents might not understand having fun without a plan
But that's what we do
We're all here (let's go!)
Gonna make this party grow
Together we can make it blow right through the roof

[Pre-Chorus 2]
The music's gonna start a revolution (revolution)
Too late to play it safe

[Chorus]
Hey, get up, get loud
Start pumping up the party now
Hey, get up, get loud
Start pumping up the party now

[Bridge]
We don't have to paint by numbers
Let our voice come out from under
Hear it rise, feel the thunder
It's time to lose control

[Chorus]
Hey, get up, get loud
Start pumping up the party now
Hey, get up, get loud
Start pumping up the party now
Hey, get up, get loud
Start pumping up the party now
Hey, get up, get loud
Start pumping up the party now

[Refrain]
(Pumping up the party now, party now, party now)

[Chorus]
Hey, get up, get loud
Start pumping up the party now
Hey, get up, get loud
Start pumping up the party now
Hey, get up, get loud
Start pumping up the party now
Hey, get up, get loud
Start pumping up the party now
